pages.text: Created using an $(blood)Alchemy Array$() by combining a $(l:animus:items/reagentconsumption)Reagent: Consumption$() with an $(item)Imbued Slate$(). The reagent must first be forged in the Hellfire Forge.
Corrupt the world itself. This dire sigil converts blocks into $(blood)AntiLife$(); a corrupting substance that spreads and destroys. Use with extreme caution.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)LP Cost:$() 25 LP per block (configurable)$(br2)$(bold)Range:$() 8 blocks (configurable)$(br2)Right-click to convert nearby blocks to AntiLife. The corruption will spread outward, consuming all it touches.$(br2)$(bold)Warning:$() AntiLife cannot be reversed. Plan carefully.

pages.title: Protected Blocks
pages.text: Blocks tagged $(#)animus:disallow_antilife$() cannot be converted:$(li)Barrier, Bedrock$(li)Command blocks$(li)Structure blocks$(li)End portals$(li)AntiLife itself$(br2)See $(l:animus:blocks/antilife)AntiLife$() for full details on this corruption.
